body:
encountered something new today -- `graphviz` hangs while trying to checkout the sources, namely this commit https://gitlab.com/graphviz/graphviz/commit/67cd2e5121379a38e0801cc05cce5033f8a2a609 

### Expected Result

actually check it out.

### Actual Result

```
==> Installing graphviz
==> Trying to clone git repository: https://gitlab.com/graphviz/graphviz.git at commit 67cd2e5121379a38e0801cc05cce5033f8a2a609
<doing-nothing-for-ages>
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install graphviz
```

### Information on your system

`macOS`
title: spack hangs when cloning git repo
